channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 9 Canning Road, 7th June
item.description:
There is a 6ft fence running along the perimeter of number 9 Canning Road, this is causing a major obstruction fro cars going up to number: 10/11/12/14/15/16. Numerous near misses have happened here so this needs to be lowered or removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned roadworks on pavement, 7th June
item.description:
Please provide an update on Web Reference: 7511420; Enquiry Number: 22077489. This obstruction was reported on 01/05/25 (i.e. over a month ago). This Report was passed to the Highways team on 02/05/25 for assessment, and despite a promise to provide an update, there has been neither an update nor any removal of the obstruction. This is despite the Highways team clearly having visited Gloucester Road during this time and spray painting defects to pavements elsewhere on Gloucester Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 226, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 153, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
